Subject: Re: War

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Unitron/Minion/Chaos/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark 
Claw/Serpentor:




Dark One dodged the shots, transforming to jet fighter mode and launching off 
into the air.

---

Breakdown smiles to himself.  "Ha, is right!" he yelled, firing another shell 
off at Blender.

---

Pyro stumbled back from Deemos' shots, firing a 'continous' blast of flames 
at Stronghold.

---

Hiss fired off three fusion blasts at Stronghold's left knee from his cannon.

---

Scavenger fired 25 explosive shells from his rifle at Shapredge.  Turning to 
see the grenades, he jumped to the side, doing a cartwheel as the grenades 
explode.  He lifts his left arm, blocking all the shrapnel and laughing.

---

Dark Claw fired off two more missiles from his attack vehicle mode at the 
Mafia base.  He would put the squeeze on that pathetic base.

---

Flesh Ripper caught the missiles in his chest plate, a deep gash visible in 
his chest.
Putting away the rifle, he clasped his hands together, slowly pulling them 
apart.  He stopped when they were a foot away from each other.  In between, 
was a blue sphere of destructive energy.

Using one hand, Flesh Ripper threw the energy up at Sharpedge.  It would have 
the effect of a charge.

---

Chaos fired ten rapid shots from his rifle up at Jetstorm.

---

Minion fired off ten rapid optic blasts at Jetstorm.

---

Sixshot, making another pass, fired off two missiles down at the Mafia base.
